text: The 1924 Washington State Cougars football team was an American football team that represented Washington State College during the 1924 college football season. Head coach Albert Exendine led the team to a 0–4–1 mark in the PCC and 1–5–2 overall. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Opponent ! scope="col" | Location ! scope="col" | Score ! scope="col" | Attendance |- ! scope="row" | October 4 | Pacific (Oregon) | Home | 65-0 W | 4,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 11 | Gonzaga | Home | 12-14 L | 8,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 17 | Idaho | Away | 3-19 L | 10,000 |- ! scope="row" | October 25 | California | Away | 7-20 L | 35,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 8 | Oregon State | Home | 13-14 L | 3,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 15 | Oregon | P | 7-7 T | 10,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 22 | Washington | Away | 0-14 L | 10,000 |- ! scope="row" | November 27 | Gonzaga | Away | 0-0 T | 8,000 |} ==References== Washington State Category:Washington State Cougars football seasons Category:1924 in Washington (state)
